name: Flash
description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

name: Ignite
description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing true damage over time.

name: Heal
description: Restores Health to your champion and target allied champion.

name: Barrier
description: Shields your champion from incoming damage.

name: Teleport
description: After channeling, teleports your champion to target allied structure.
